xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #ccm on 21 March 2014
xwikidoc.content: <n7704> has joined #ccm 01:06 <lyonwj> has joined #ccm 01:55 <sdumitriu> has joined #ccm 03:57 <sanjhee__> has joined #ccm 03:59 <sanjhee> has joined #ccm 06:25 <SayAsh_> has joined #ccm 06:46 <groundnuty> has joined #ccm 07:11 <groundnuty> sdumitriu_[Away]: Dear Sir, I'm writing a proposal for "Development of machine learning methods for modeling the evolution of tumors". The more I read into a cited paper the more I conclude that the main chalange will be to grasp the complexity of the created method - not the coding and optimization part 07:16 <groundnuty> sdumitriu_[Away]: without a very good understanding of statistical methods and biology behind it its difficult to analyze the python codebase and propose a detailed architecture of the proposed solution 07:20 <groundnuty> said that, I would like to ask: who are you looking for? a person with good statistical/biological background who understads the subject of cited article well, or a computer scientis/programer? 09:03 <Shubham> has joined #ccm 09:53 <Shubham> has joined #ccm 11:05 <vijay13> has joined #ccm 11:17 <vijay13> has joined #ccm 11:20 <Shubham1> has joined #ccm 11:41 <shalinshah1993> has joined #ccm 12:59 <nav93> has joined #ccm 13:12 <sdumitriu> Hey groundnuty 13:16 <nairboon> has joined #ccm 13:19 <shalinshah1993> has joined #ccm 13:52 <vijay13> has joined #ccm 14:07 <shalinshah1993> How many application did MedSavant get this time? 14:08 <Shubham> has joined #ccm 14:11 <sdumitriu> 14 14:11 <sdumitriu> (so far) 14:11 <sdumitriu> Wait, miscounted 14:11 <sdumitriu> 11 14:17 <Shubham> has joined #ccm 14:23 <SayAsh> has joined #ccm 14:31 <shalinshah1993> Oh, so many. 14:31 <sdumitriu> I was expecting more, there were many emails 14:31 <shalinshah1993> And how many slots do you expect? 14:31 <sdumitriu> Either waiting for the last moment or found something more interesting 14:31 <sdumitriu> No idea 14:31 <shalinshah1993> I is going to be a tough competition then. 14:32 <shalinshah1993> it* 14:32 <Shubham> has joined #ccm 14:33 <shalinshah1993> So now where will every be more active IRC or email? 14:36 <shalinshah1993> Oh and I also have this confusion what is difference between MedSavant and GenomeSavant since when open MedSavant it redirects us 14:37 <shalinshah1993> to genomesavant 14:37 <shalinshah1993> or are the interchangeable ? 14:38 <vijay13> has joined #ccm 14:46 <Shubham> has joined #ccm 14:53 <groundnuty> shalinshah1993: add one more, just submited mine :) 14:53 <Shubham> has joined #ccm 14:53 <groundnuty> sory it was to sdumitriu 14:57 <sdumitriu> They're coming 1 per minute now 14:58 <shalinshah1993> Really? 14:58 <shalinshah1993> :D 15:00 <shalinshah1993> So now what is the final total? 15:01 <sdumitriu> 59 15:02 <sdumitriu> Up from 39 last year 15:02 <shalinshah1993> Boy! Such a jump from 11 to 59. God bless us! 15:02 <shalinshah1993> :D 15:03 <sdumitriu> Oh, no, they're not all for MedSavant 15:03 <sdumitriu> 59 for the whole of CCM 15:03 <sdumitriu> Now it looks like there are 14 for MedSavant 15:03 <sdumitriu> Although there might be more if they didn't include Medsavant in the title 15:04 <shalinshah1993> Alright. 15:05 <shalinshah1993> Well, it's ought to be ideas for CCM were really intriguing 15:07 <Shubham> has joined #ccm 15:11 <groundnuty> if I may ask, PhyloSub is part of MedSavant or...? 15:12 <sdumitriu> No, it's a separate project 15:12 <groundnuty> any statistics regarding this one? 15:12 <sdumitriu> That looks like the most popular one 15:13 <groundnuty> sdumitriu: ok, thank you for the news :) 15:15 <shalin__> has joined #ccm 15:16 <shalinshah1993> has joined #ccm 15:17 <sdumitriu> A quick filter shows 20 applications for the two tumor projects 15:25 <Shubham> has joined #ccm 15:32 <Shubham> has joined #ccm 15:42 <Shubham> has joined #ccm 15:51 <Shubham> has joined #ccm 15:58 <Shubham> has joined #ccm 16:16 <Shubham> has joined #ccm 16:18 <shalinshah1993> has joined #ccm 16:19 <Shubham1> has joined #ccm 16:32 <tweety098> has joined #ccm 16:42 <Shubham> has joined #ccm 16:58 <Shubham> has joined #ccm 17:16 <Shubham> has joined #ccm 17:39 <Shubham> has joined #ccm 17:39 <vijay13> has joined #ccm 17:46 <Shubham> has joined #ccm 17:53 <vijay13> has joined #ccm 20:51 <Shubham> has joined #ccm 20:58 <Shubham> has joined #ccm 21:06 <Shubham> has joined #ccm 21:17 <Shubham> has joined #ccm 21:39 <shalinshah1993> has joined #ccm 22:16 <Shubham> has joined #ccm 22:37 <vijay13> has joined #ccm 23:11 <shalinshah1993> has joined #ccm
